abstract: Standard & Poor’s says the government is overreaching in its civil case, which asserts that firm inflated its ratings to win business.
snippet: Standard & Poor’s says the government is overreaching in its civil case, which asserts that firm inflated its ratings to win business.

headline.main: S.&P. Seeks Dismissal of U.S. Suit Over Rating of Mortgage Debt
headline.print_headline: S.&P. Seeks Dismissal of U.S. Civil Suit Over Rating of Mortgage Debt
